descriptionHtml:
Add follower Rin.

She is in White Run Huntsman.I also have a shout that reflects a certain amount of physical damage.

Thanks to various wonderful mods she was born, please take me to your adventure.

Thanks to Mr. RisaHino Mr. Sakata for giving me advice!

CREDITS
